title: Skin dissapeared
body: I bought the skin "zombie brand" during the halloween event and I got to use it a couple of time before it went missing. I don't remember when it dissapeared, but my friend had the same incident with the skin "mafia jinx". I don't know if any of my other skins dissapeared but I hope that this can be solved.

replies.body:
Hey there! 

Sorry to hear about your missing content. 

We'd removed some player's content if it was obtained from Refer a Friend abuse. However, if you don't fall into that category, the best thing you can do is submit a ticket to [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they'll be able to take a look at your account and see what's going on!
